name: The shelter of patient
description:
This game is a 3D based simulation game and has a high graphic level.

This game contains some English subtitles, and the background music has been reduced as much as possible for the player's concentration.

Help the protagonist, the journalist, explore the mansion, light the way, read notes and collect clues.

You never know what will happen in this mansion. Escape the mansion by enduring multiple psychic attacks.

Also, escape the mansion while avoiding the mysterious creatures in the mansion.

Nothing protects you from the deep darkness.

good luck.

If you have any in-game bugs or issues, please report them in the Discord bug report.
